reviewText: A "C" class effort with some "A" class star power. The writing is "Just OK" BUT the direction of the movie is "TERRIBLE". Talents like Shashi Kapoor, Vinod Khanna, Parveen Babi, Ranjit are totally wasted. One of the many senseless movies which have been churned out from bollywood which have no logic, no sense and absolutely no value. Stay Away From This One.......!!!!
